commit.message: add test for VLA stack overflow error

Give malloc call typecast.

"malloc" wasn't being casted to our fancy uint8_t data structure

commit.message:
Tested and fixed decrypt method also.

Used astyle to appease travis. Removed the decrypt VLA
and tested for that overflow in encryptsave as well.
